channel.title: A little help
channel.description:
I have plans to use MITB's status checker for a website in the future. I believe I have everything set up properly so far but I want to make sure the cronjob is working (I've never set one up before...)
Could a few people with RS Servers please add them to my list and leave them there until I get everything figured out.
This site WON'T be for RS servers but right now I want to ensure everything is working before I change any code around..
The website is http://minecraftstatus.org/status/serverstatus.php
After today I will lock this thread and remove the link -- If any other moderator feels I'm violating any rules, etc, then feel free to PM me why you removed it and go ahead and remove this thread yourself :)
PS: Post any errors here please!
(I'll respond after I get out of work, about 7 hours or so from now.)

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @JakeP JakeP
item.description:
@JakeP wrote:

Not a problem, let me know when you have checked everything and I will try again to see if you have sorted it

EDIT

Seems to be working now, posted my server, had to do a verification but it said “Hacking attempt…” I also logged in with the credentials given on the verification page, it says my server needs to be approved.

I hope it works for you

EDIT

Your webhosting is down.

Read full topic

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“JakeP, post:4, topic:421738”]Yes, as stated my server is 24/7.

Just logged into my server to check if it was actually online and it is.

May have issues trying to connect to see if it is online?[/quote]

Yep I’ll have to check on it when I get home…

Thanks for trying.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JakeP JakeP
item.description:
@JakeP wrote:

Yes, as stated my server is 24/7.

Just logged into my server to check if it was actually online and it is.

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

JakeP:

Would you like me to register and add a server to the list? If so I will do that right now. My server runs 24/7 so will hopefully get the uptime counter tested

Please do.

EDIT: Is your server online?

Read full topic

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @JakeP JakeP
item.description:
@JakeP wrote:

Would you like me to register and add a server to the list? If so I will do that right now. My server runs 24/7 so will hopefully get the uptime counter tested

Trying to add a server, I get this message.

Error:
The server ValhallaScape is offline, it must be online before you can register it here.

Read full topic
